CreateBasicDDoSAlarmThreshold.document: This API is used to set the DDoS alarm threshold for Anti-DDoS Basic, which is only supported for Anti-DDoS Basic.
CreateBasicDDoSAlarmThreshold.name: Sets DDoS alarm threshold for Anti-DDoS Basic

CreateBoundIP.document: This API is used to bind an IP to an Anti-DDoS Pro instance, which supports both single IP instances and multi-IP instances. It should be noted that this API is async; therefore, if a binding/unbinding operation is in progress, new binding/unbinding operations cannot be initiated.
CreateBoundIP.name: Binds an IP to Anti-DDoS Pro instance

CreateCCFrequencyRules.document: This API is used to add an access frequency control rule for CC protection.
CreateCCFrequencyRules.name: Adds access frequency control rule for CC protection

CreateCCSelfDefinePolicy.document: This API is used to create a custom CC policy.
CreateCCSelfDefinePolicy.name: Creates custom CC policy

CreateDDoSPolicy.document: This API is used to add an advanced DDoS policy.
CreateDDoSPolicy.name: Adds advanced DDoS policy

CreateDDoSPolicyCase.document: This API is used to add a policy scenario.
CreateDDoSPolicyCase.name: Adds policy scenario

CreateInstanceName.document: This API is used to rename a resource instance, which supports single IP instances, multi-IP instances, Anti-DDoS Advanced, and Anti-DDoS Ultimate.
CreateInstanceName.name: Renames resource instance

CreateL4HealthConfig.document: This API is used to upload layer-4 health check configuration.
CreateL4HealthConfig.name: Uploads layer-4 health check configuration

CreateL4Rules.document: This API is used to add a layer-4 forwarding rule.
CreateL4Rules.name: Adds layer-4 forwarding rule

CreateL7CCRule.document: This API is used to add a custom frequency control rule for layer-7 CC access (it works in the IP + Host dimension and does not support specific URIs). As it has been disused, please call the new `CreateCCFrequencyRules` API, which supports both IP + Host and URI.
CreateL7CCRule.name: Creates customer layer-7 CC rule

CreateL7HealthConfig.document: This API is used to upload layer-7 health check configuration.
CreateL7HealthConfig.name: Uploads layer-7 health check configuration

CreateL7RuleCert.document: This API is used to configure a certificate for a layer-7 forwarding rule.
CreateL7RuleCert.name: Configures certificate for layer-7 forwarding rule

CreateL7Rules.document: This API is used to add a layer-7 (website) forwarding rule.
CreateL7Rules.name: Adds layer-7 forwarding rule

CreateL7RulesUpload.document: This API is used to upload layer-7 forwarding rules in batches.
CreateL7RulesUpload.name: Uploads layer-7 forwarding rules in batches

CreateNetReturn.document: This API is used to switch to the real server in Anti-DDoS Ultimate.
CreateNetReturn.name: Switches to real server

CreateNewL7RulesUpload.document: This API is used to batch upload Layer-7 forwarding rules.
CreateNewL7RulesUpload.name: Batch uploads Layer-7 forwarding rules.

CreateUnblockIp.document: This API is used to unblock an IP.
CreateUnblockIp.name: Unblocks IP

DeleteCCFrequencyRules.document: This API is used to delete an access frequency control rule for CC protection.

DeleteCCSelfDefinePolicy.document: This API is used to delete a custom CC policy.

DeleteL7Rules.document: This API is used to delete one or more layer-7 forwarding rules.
DeleteL7Rules.name: Deletes one or more layer-7 forwarding rules

DescribeCCAlarmThreshold.document: This API is used to get the alarm notification threshold set for CC attacks in Anti-DDoS Pro, Anti-DDoS Advanced, Anti-DDoS Ultimate, and Chess Shield.

DescribeDDoSCount.name: Gets DDoS attack proportion analysis

It is supported for Anti-DDoS Basic, single IP instance, multi-IP instance, Anti-DDoS Advanced, and Anti-DDoS Ultimate. It is used to query whether DDoS protection is temporarily disabled, and if yes, return parameters such as temporary disablement duration.

DescribeDDoSEvInfo.document: This API is used to get details of a specific DDoS attack.
DescribeDDoSEvInfo.name: Gets details of a specific DDoS attack

DescribeDDoSEvList.name: Gets DDoS attack event list

DescribeDDoSIpLog.document: This API is used to get a DDoS IP attack log.
DescribeDDoSIpLog.name: Gets DDoS IP attack log

DescribeDDoSNetEvInfo.document: This API is used to get the DDoS attack event details of an Anti-DDoS Ultimate resource.

DescribeDDoSNetIpLog.document: This API is used to get the DDoS IP attack logs of an Anti-DDoS Ultimate resource.

DescribeDDoSPolicy.document: This API is used to get an advanced DDoS policy.

DescribeDDoSTrend.document: This API is used to get the data of DDoS attack traffic bandwidth and attack packet rate.
DescribeDDoSTrend.name: Gets DDoS attack metric data

DescribeDDoSUsedStatis.document: This API is used to count the number of days of Anti-DDoS resource use and number of DDoS attacks defended against.
DescribeDDoSUsedStatis.name: Gets DDoS protection usage statistics

DescribeIPProductInfo.document: This API is used to get the Tencent Cloud asset information corresponding to an IP of a single IP instance or multi-IP instance, which is supported only for IPs of single IP instances and multi-IP instances.

DescribePolicyCase.document: This API is used to get the policy scenario.
DescribePolicyCase.name: Gets policy scenario

DescribeResIpList.document: This API is used to get the IP list of a resource.
DescribeResIpList.name: Gets the IP list of resource

DescribeResourceList.document: This API is used to get the resource list.

DescribeRuleSets.document: This API is used to get the number of rules of a resource.
DescribeRuleSets.name: Gets the number of rules of resource

DescribeSecIndex.document: This API is used to get the security statistics of the current month.

DescribeSourceIpSegment.document: This API is used to get the intermediate IP range. It is supported for Anti-DDoS Advanced and Anti-DDoS Ultimate.

DescribeTransmitStatis.document: This API is used to get the business forwarding statistics, including forwarded traffic and packet forwarding rate.

DescribeUnBlockStatis.document: This API is used to get the number of blackhole unblockings.

ModifyCCAlarmThreshold.document: This API is used to set the alarm notification threshold for CC attacks in Anti-DDoS Pro, Anti-DDoS Advanced, Anti-DDoS Ultimate, and Chess Shield.

ModifyCCFrequencyRules.name: Modifies access frequency control rule for CC protection

ModifyCCFrequencyRulesStatus.name: Enables or disables access frequency control rule for CC protection

ModifyCCHostProtection.document: This API is used to enable or disable CC domain name protection.
ModifyCCHostProtection.name: Enables or disables CC domain name protection

ModifyCCIpAllowDeny.document: This API is used to add/remove a CC IP to/from the blocklist/allowlist.
ModifyCCIpAllowDeny.name: Adds/Removes CC IP to/from blocklist/allowlist

ModifyCCLevel.document: This API is used to modify CC protection level.
ModifyCCLevel.name: Modifies CC protection level

ModifyCCPolicySwitch.document: This API is used to enable or disable a custom CC policy.
ModifyCCPolicySwitch.name: Enables or disables custom CC policy

ModifyCCSelfDefinePolicy.document: This API is used to modify a custom CC policy.
ModifyCCSelfDefinePolicy.name: Modifies custom CC policy

ModifyCCThreshold.document: This API is used to modify the CC protection threshold.
ModifyCCThreshold.name: Modifies CC protection threshold

ModifyCCUrlAllow.document: This API is used to add/remove a CC URL to/from the allowlist.
ModifyCCUrlAllow.name: Adds/Removes CC URL to/from allowlist

ModifyDDoSAIStatus.document: This API is used to read or modify DDoS AI protection status.

ModifyDDoSAlarmThreshold.name: Sets DDoS alarm notification threshold

ModifyDDoSDefendStatus.document: This API is used to enable or disable DDoS. It can disable DDoS protection for a period of time, which will be automatically enabled after the period of time elapses.
ModifyDDoSDefendStatus.name: Modifies DDoS protection status

ModifyDDoSLevel.document: This API is used to read or modify DDoS protection level.
ModifyDDoSLevel.name: Modifies DDoS IP protection level

ModifyDDoSPolicy.document: This API is used to modify an advanced DDoS policy.
ModifyDDoSPolicy.name: Modifies advanced DDoS policy

ModifyDDoSPolicyCase.name: Modifies policy scenario

ModifyDDoSPolicyName.document: This API is used to rename an advanced DDoS policy.
ModifyDDoSPolicyName.name: Renames advanced DDoS policy

ModifyDDoSSwitch.document: This API is used to enable or disable DDoS protection, which is only supported for Anti-DDoS Basic.

ModifyDDoSThreshold.document: This API is used to modify the DDoS cleansing threshold.

ModifyL4KeepTime.name: Modifies the session persistence of layer-4 forwarding rule

ModifyL4Rules.document: This API is used to modify a layer-4 forwarding rule.
ModifyL4Rules.name: Modifies layer-4 forwarding rule

ModifyL7Rules.document: This API is used to modify the layer-7 forwarding rules.
ModifyL7Rules.name: Modifies the layer-7 forwarding rules.

ModifyNetReturnSwitch.document: This API is used to switch a client to the real server and set the switch duration when the client is under attack or blocked.

ModifyNewDomainRules.document: This API is used to modify layer-7 forwarding rules.
ModifyNewDomainRules.name: Modifies layer-7 forwarding rules

ModifyNewL4Rule.document: This API is used to modify layer-4 forwarding rules.
ModifyNewL4Rule.name: Modifies layer-4 forwarding rules

ModifyResourceRenewFlag.name: Enables or disables auto-renewal for a resource

members.name: MetricName

members.document:
`Key-Value` array. Valid values of `Key`:
If `MetricName` is `traffic`:
If `key` is `TcpKBSum`, it indicates the traffic of TCP packets in KB.
If `key` is `UdpKBSum`, it indicates the traffic of UDP packets in KB.
If `key` is `IcmpKBSum`, it indicates the traffic of ICMP packets in KB.
If `key` is `OtherKBSum`, it indicates the traffic of other packets in KB.

If `MetricName` is `pkg`:
If `key` is `TcpPacketSum`, it indicates the number of TCP packets.
If `key` is `UdpPacketSum`, it indicates the number of UDP packets.
If `key` is `IcmpPacketSum`, it indicates the number of ICMP packets.
If `key` is `OtherPacketSum`, it indicates the number of other packets.

If `MetricName` is `classnum`:
The value of `key` indicates the attack event type. When the `key` is `UNKNOWNFLOOD`, it indicates  unknown attack events.

"gz":     South China (Guangzhou)

"hk":     Hong Kong (China)
"kr":     Southeast Asia (Seoul)
"sh":     East China (Shanghai)
"shjr":   East China (Shanghai Finance)
"szjr":   South China (Shenzhen Finance)
"sg":     Southeast Asia (Singapore)
"th":     Southeast Asia (Thailand)
"de":     Europe (Germany)
"usw":    West US (Silicon Valley)
"ca":     North America (Toronto)
"jp":     Japan
"hzec":   Hangzhou
"in":     India
"use":    East US (Virginia)
"ru":     Russia
"tpe":    Taiwan (China)

members.document:
Resource record list. The description of key values is as follows:
"Key": "CreateTime" (Instance purchase time)
"Key": "Region" (Instance region)
"Key": "BoundIP" (IP bound to the single-IP instance)
"Key": "Id" (Instance ID)
"Key": "CCEnabled" (CC protection switch status of the instance)
"Key": "DDoSThreshold" (Anti-DDoS cleansing threshold of the instance)	
"Key": "BoundStatus" (IP binding status of the single-IP/multi-IP instance; binding or bound)
"Key": "Type" (Disused field)
"Key": "ElasticLimit" (Elastic protection value of the instance)
"Key": "DDoSAI" (Anti-DDoS AI protection switch of the instance)
"Key": "OverloadCount" (The number of attacks exceeding the elastic protection value to the instance)
"Key": "Status" (Instance status; idle: running; attacking: under attacks; blocking: being blocked; isolate: being isolated)
"Key": "Lbid" (Disused field)
"Key": "ShowFlag" (Disused field)
"Key": "Expire" (Instance expiry time)
"Key": "CCThreshold" (CC protection trigger value of the instance)
"Key": "AutoRenewFlag" (Whether the instance is on auto-renewal)
"Key": "IspCode" (Line of the single-IP/multi-IP instance; 0: China Telecom; 1: China Unicom; 2: China Mobile; 5: BGP)
"Key": "PackType" (Package type)
"Key": "PackId" (Package ID)
"Key": "Name" (Instance name)
"Key": "Locked" (Disused field)
"Key": "IpDDoSLevel" (Protection level of the instance; low: loose; middle: normal; high: strict)
"Key": "DefendStatus" (DDoS protection status of the instance; enabled or temporarily disabled)
"Key": "UndefendExpire" (End time of the temporary disabling on DDoS protection for the instance)
"Key": "Tgw" (Whether it is a new instance)
"Key": "Bandwidth" (Base protection value of the Anti-DDoS Pro/Advanced instance)
"Key": "DdosMax" (Base protection value of the Anti-DDoS Ultimate instance)
"Key": "GFBandwidth" (Base business application bandwidth of the Anti-DDoS Advanced instance)
"Key": "ServiceBandwidth" (Base business application bandwidth of the Anti-DDoS Ultimate instance)
members.name: ServicePacks

members.document:
CC protection threshold. Valid values: (0 100 150 240 350 480 550 700 850 1000 1500 2000 3000 5000 10000 20000);
If `Business` is Anti-DDoS Advanced or Anti-DDoS Ultimate, its maximum CC protection threshold is subject to the base protection bandwidth in the following way:
  Base bandwidth: maximum CC protection threshold
  10:  20000,
  20:  40000,
  30:  70000,
  40:  100000,
  50:  150000,
  60:  200000,
  80:  250000,
  100: 300000,
